DisplayedItem.name: DI_44512
DisplayedItem.title: Reporting of pT, pN, and (when applicable) pM categories is based on information available to the pathologist at the time the report is issued. As per the AJCC (Chapter 1, 8th Ed.) it is the managing physician’s responsibility to establish the final pathologic stage based upon all pertinent information, including but potentially not limited to this pathology report.

Property.name: p_rptTxt_44512_1
Property.val: Reporting of pT, pN, and (when applicable) pM categories is based on information available to the pathologist at the time the report is issued. As per the AJCC (Chapter 1, 8th Ed.) it is the managing physician’s responsibility to establish the final pathologic stage based upon all pertinent information, including but potentially not limited to this pathology report.

DisplayedItem.name: DI_24552
DisplayedItem.title: Superficial erosion alone of bone / tooth socket by gingival primary is not sufficient to classify a tumor as T4.

DisplayedItem.name: DI_44206
DisplayedItem.title: DOI is depth of invasion and not tumor thickness.

ListItem.name: LI_327861
ListItem.title: pT not assigned (cannot be determined based on available pathological information)

ListItem.name: LI_54742
ListItem.title: pT1: Tumor less than or equal to 2 cm with depth of invasion (DOI) less than or equal to 5 mm

ListItem.name: LI_43894
ListItem.title: pT2: Tumor less than or equal to 2 cm with DOI greater than 5 mm or tumor greater than 2 cm and less than or equal to 4 cm with DOI less than or equal to 10 mm

ListItem.name: LI_42666
ListItem.title: pT3: Tumor greater than 2 cm and less than or equal to 4 cm with DOI greater than 10 mm or tumor greater than 4 cm with DOI less than or equal to 10 mm

DisplayedItem.name: DI_54162
DisplayedItem.title: pT4: Moderately advanced or very advanced local disease

ListItem.name: LI_515678
ListItem.title: pT4a: Moderately advanced local disease. Tumor greater than 4 cm with DOI greater than 10 mm or tumor invades adjacent structures only (e.g., through cortical bone of the mandible or maxilla or involves the maxillary sinus or skin of the face)

ListItem.name: LI_23292
ListItem.title: pT4b: Very advanced local disease. Tumor invades masticator space, pterygoid plates, or skull base, and / or encases internal carotid artery

ListItem.name: LI_866517
ListItem.title: (m) multiple primary synchronous tumors in a single organ

DisplayedItem.name: DI_41263
DisplayedItem.title: # Midline nodes are considered ipsilateral nodes.

DisplayedItem.name: DI_58183
DisplayedItem.title: Pathological ENE should be recorded as ENE(−) or ENE(+).

DisplayedItem.name: DI_54047
DisplayedItem.title: Measurement of the metastatic focus in the lymph nodes is based on the largest metastatic deposit size, which may include matted or fused lymph nodes.

ListItem.name: LI_327863
ListItem.title: pN not assigned (no nodes submitted or found)

ListItem.name: LI_327864
ListItem.title: pN not assigned (cannot be determined based on available pathological information)

ListItem.name: LI_23370
ListItem.title: pN0: No regional lymph node metastasis

ListItem.name: LI_56265
ListItem.title: pN1: Metastasis in a single ipsilateral lymph node, 3 cm or smaller in greatest dimension and ENE(-)

DisplayedItem.name: DI_46820
DisplayedItem.title: pN2: Metastasis in a single ipsilateral lymph node, 3 cm or smaller in greatest dimension and ENE(+); or larger than 3 cm but not larger than 6 cm in greatest dimension and ENE(-); or metastases in multiple ipsilateral lymph nodes, none larger than 6 cm in greatest dimension and ENE(-); or in bilateral or contralateral lymph node(s), none larger than 6 cm in greatest dimension and ENE(-)

ListItem.name: LI_41237
ListItem.title: pN2a: Metastasis in single ipsilateral node 3 cm or smaller in greatest dimension and ENE(+); or a single ipsilateral node larger than 3 cm but not larger than 6 cm in greatest dimension and ENE(-)

ListItem.name: LI_41253
ListItem.title: pN2b: Metastases in multiple ipsilateral nodes, none larger than 6 cm in greatest dimension and ENE(-)

ListItem.name: LI_51078
ListItem.title: pN2c: Metastases in bilateral or contralateral lymph node(s), none larger than 6 cm in greatest dimension and ENE(-)

DisplayedItem.name: DI_46130
DisplayedItem.title: pN3: Metastasis in a lymph node larger than 6 cm in greatest dimension and ENE(-); or metastasis in a single ipsilateral node larger than 3 cm in greatest dimension and ENE(+); or multiple ipsilateral, contralateral or bilateral nodes any with ENE(+); or a single contralateral node of any size and ENE(+)

ListItem.name: LI_53703
ListItem.title: pN3a: Metastasis in a lymph node larger than 6 cm in greatest dimension and ENE(-)

ListItem.name: LI_44478
ListItem.title: pN3b: Metastasis in a single ipsilateral node larger than 3 cm in greatest dimension and ENE(+); or multiple ipsilateral, contralateral or bilateral nodes any with ENE(+); or a single contralateral node of any size and ENE(+)

ListItem.name: LI_2287
ListItem.title: ?Not applicable - pM cannot be determined from the submitted specimen(s)

Property.name: p_rptTxt_2287_1
Property.val: Not applicable - pM cannot be determined from the submitted specimen(s)

ListItem.name: LI_53975
ListItem.title: pT3: Tumors limited to the mucosa and immediately underlying soft tissue, regardless of thickness or greatest dimension; for example, polypoid nasal disease, pigmented or nonpigmented lesions of the oral cavity, pharynx, or larynx

DisplayedItem.name: DI_50458
DisplayedItem.title: pT4: Moderately advanced or very advanced local disease

ListItem.name: LI_24558
ListItem.title: pT4a: Moderately advanced disease. Tumor involving deep soft tissue, cartilage, bone, or overlying skin

ListItem.name: LI_24559
ListItem.title: pT4b: Very advanced disease. Tumor involving brain, dura, skull base, lower cranial nerves (IX, X, XI, XII), masticator space, carotid artery, prevertebral space, or mediastinal structures

ListItem.name: LI_866520
ListItem.title: (m) multiple primary synchronous tumors in a single organ

ListItem.title: pN not assigned (no nodes submitted or found)

ListItem.name: LI_327867
ListItem.title: pN not assigned (cannot be determined based on available pathological information)

ListItem.name: LI_24561
ListItem.title: pN0: No regional lymph node metastases

ListItem.name: LI_24562
ListItem.title: pN1: Regional lymph node metastases present

ListItem.name: LI_24563
ListItem.title: ?Not applicable - pM cannot be determined from the submitted specimen(s)

Property.name: p_rptTxt_24563_1
Property.val: Not applicable - pM cannot be determined from the submitted specimen(s)

DisplayedItem.title: For reporting molecular testing and other cancer biomarker testing results, the CAP Head and Neck Biomarker Template should be used. Pending biomarker studies should be listed in the Comments section of this report.
